sentences.english: I stepped outside and walked at a leisurely pace down Madison Ave.
sentences.chinese: 我走出屋外，迈着悠闲的步子沿着麦迪逊大街走着。

sentences.english: Rick quickly leaves the shed, and Eli questions him outside.
sentences.chinese: 里克快速地离开了小木屋，伊菜在屋外询问进展。

sentences.english: What are you doing?Don't dilly dally, hurry up!
sentences.chinese: 是啊，你怎么知道我上回在屋外没种成？

sentences.english: Still, it has no running water and one outdoor latrine.
sentences.chinese: 但是，还没有自来水和屋外的场院。

sentences.english: No man noticed that she streaked out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 没有人看到她一下子就闪到屋外了。

sentences.english: The now-clean cat will rocket out of the toilet, and run outside where he will dry himself.
sentences.chinese: 焕然一新的猫将冲出马桶，跑到屋外把自己弄干。

sentences.english: I was outside with a friend when she asked me if I was having a good time.
sentences.chinese: 我和一位朋友在屋外时，她问我是否玩得开心。

sentences.english: Outside, the stars shone through the window above a jagged row of firs.
sentences.chinese: 屋外，星光从一排参差的冷杉树梢上透进窗子。

sentences.english: Outside a female servant to XiaoFei report has three officials see XiaoFei.
sentences.chinese: 屋外一个女下人向萧妃报告有三个官员参见萧妃。

sentences.english: Last winter Grandmother left her spider plant outdoors and forgot about it.…
sentences.chinese: 去年冬天，祖母忘了把屋外的吊兰拿进来。

sentences.english: One day, while sitting outside in his lawn chair, Larry had his eureka moment.
sentences.chinese: 一天，当拉里坐在屋外的折椅上时，突然灵机一动。

sentences.english: After drinking up a cup of wine, I walk out of the house, dancing with the snowflakes.
sentences.chinese: 一杯酒下肚后，我走出屋外，与雪花共舞起来。

sentences.english: As the sun rose over the horizon, I went out to enjoy the beauty of the grassland scenery.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳升过地平线时，我走出屋外来欣赏草原的美景。

sentences.english: During the night, Pan heard slow footsteps and breathing noises outside his room.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，潘文石听到屋外传来缓慢的脚步声和呼吸声。

sentences.english: As the solarise chromatic over the horizon, I went out to savor the loveliness of the grassland landscape.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳升过地平线时，我走出屋外来欣赏草原的美景。

definition: outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
